page.title: 18THE GROUNDWORK TRUST.
page.content: In recent years a number of really imaginative projects in redevelopment have begun in our area, organised by the ' Groundwork Trust'. This was established in St.Helens and Knowsley in 1982 to carry out work on the natural experiment :- "Operation Groundwork", introduced in 1980. Since then four other areas in North West England have been added to the original pilot area, all chosen because of their problems of dereliction. The experiment aims to improve and make better use of the landscape around major industrial centres and hopes to provide a blue-print for other European Cities. At present it is government funded by the Countryside Commission and the relevant Local Councils, but the Trust aims to be self sufficient in time.
